Title: Trying to remember a chess game I played 6 years ago. It was a smith morra with: 4. ... e5 It was ~1...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Trying to remember a chess game I played 6 years ago. It was a smith morra with: 4. ... e5 It was ~12 moves and ended when white had a windmill going with the black queen locked up. But there might have been a mating continuation. Lmk if you can figure out the other 7 moves.
